charges.charge_description: 18:113F.F ASSAULT RESULTING IN SERIOUS BODILY INJURY AND 18:1153.F CRIME ON RESERVATION(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft is Sentenced on Count 1 in the Indictment to B.O.P. for a term of 24 months; Supervised Release for a term of 3 years. Standard and special conditions apply. Court to recommend 500 RDAP; facility at Yankton, SD; fine is waived; special assessment of 100.00 due. FINAL REVOCATION HEARING HELD ON 5/20/2014 Sentenced to B.O.P. for a term of 3 months; Supervised Release 33 months with standard and special conditions apply including 6 months in a residential re-entry center. Court to recommend a facility in Englwood, CO. FINAL REVOCATION HELD 10/9/2015 The dft is sentenced to the B.O.P for a term of 12 months and 1 day with no term of supervision to follow.
